name: Aldom
description:
Disclaimer: this is a very early version of the game useing rpg maker vx ace i hope to one day change assets in the game and music and sound effects, I will keep adding more quest and things to do, stuff in game subject to change, I am offering this game for free becouse its still early in develpment and only have some quest done but working on more every day, there is some crude humor but nothing to bad, thanks and enjoy

You are a farmer and one day a mysterious  man shows up ask if you want to be king? You like the idea of being a king and set out on your adventure
